recipes.cookingMethod: 1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. 2. Cook pancetta in a pan until crispy. 3. Beat eggs and parmesan cheese in a bowl. 4. Drain spaghetti and add to the pan with pancetta. 5. Remove from heat and add egg mixture. 6. Stir until the sauce thickens. 7. Season with black pepper to taste.

1. Preheat oven to 325°F. 2. Cook bacon in a large Dutch oven until crispy. 3. Remove bacon and brown beef in bacon fat. 4. Add onion and carrots and cook until tender. 5. Add red wine and bring to a boil. 6. Cover Dutch oven and place in oven. 7. Cook for 2-3 hours until beef is tender. 8. Serve with crusty bread.
